formalpara.title: Interner Hilfetext zu dieser Applikation in Asterisk 1.2:

para.screen:
-= Info about application 'SetRDNIS' =-
[Synopsis] Set RDNIS Number
[Description] SetRDNIS(cnum): Set RDNIS Number on a call to a new value. SetRDNIS has been deprecated in favor of the function CALLERID(rdnis)

formalpara.title: Differenz des internen Hilfetexts von Asterisk 1.2 zu 1.4:
